title: Input schema for Instagram Posts scraper
description:
Get data from Instagram profiles
Important: Residential proxy is required to use this scraper!
If you don't have them, please contact us on support@apify.com

names.title: name
names.description: Provide a profile URL of the account you want to scrape the posts from.

profiles.description: Provide a profile URL of the account you want to scrape the posts from.

domains.title: domain
